This loan will be used to purchase soft drinks and the necessary materials to make the candy. S. lives with her family in the community of Laure Abajo, where they have been settled for 14 years. She has always worked in commerce, an activity that has enabled her family to get ahead.

Translated from Spanish by Mark Broscoe, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase soft drinks, flour tortillas, meat, cheese, beans, butter, oil, condiments, and salt

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Lizet

texts.es: Lizet, de 30 años de edad, convive con su pareja y fruto de ellos tienen tres hijos. Juntos residen en la hermosa selva tropical peruana, ubicada en la comunidad de Villa Quintiarina, donde tiene su propia casa a base de madera. Desde hace tres años viene trabajando en su tienda, por lo que le está dando buenos resultados económicos, y no se arrepiente por nada del mundo el haber dejado la actividad agrícola. Ahora con su negocio trata de ofrecer productos de primera necesidad, en donde tiene buen acogida por parte sus clientes debido a la variedad de precios según el poder adquisitivo de su clientes. Normalmente traba por cuenta propia, pero en ocasiones recibe la ayuda de su pareja. Anhela en el futuro ampliar su negocio con la finalidad de que pueda captar mayor clientela. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, por el cual se compromete en cumplir con su cronograma de pagos, además agradece a su banco comunal, por el buen clima cordial que existe. Con el crédito que solicita lo piensa invertir en la compra de mercadería de primera necesidad, para que no pueda tener ningún contratiempo con sus clientes.
texts.en:
Lizet is 30 years old, lives with her partner, and three children. Together they live in the beautiful tropical Peruvian forest, located in the Villa Quintiarina community, where they have their own wooden house. She has been working in her store for three years which has given her good financial results and does not regret leaving the agricultural work. With her new business she now offers essential products and she is received well by her clients due to the variety of prices depending on the client's purchasing power. She usually works on her own but occasionally receives her partner's help. In the future she wishes to increase her business to have the highest amount of clients possible. This is her first loan with MFP with which she commits to repaying the scheduled payments. In addition, she is thankful for her communal bank for the friendly atmosphere that exists. She plans on investing her loan to buy essential merchandise to prevent having any setbacks with her clients.

Translated from Spanish by Susan Garza, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Supply her store with various products.

loans.name: Aminata

texts.en: Aminata, who is married and has four children, sells food items and used clothing in Makeni, and is normally assisted by her family members.  Initially, she was financed by her husband when she began trading over three years ago.  Aminata is now requesting a loan of 3,000,000 SLL to buy more used clothing and food items.  A cool and very determined business woman, she hopes to use the proceeds to educate her children to university level and to construct a house.

loans.use: To buy more used clothing for her stall.

loans.name: Cañaveral Group

texts.es:
El comité Cañaberal nace hace mas de un años.
Las señoras que integran este comité se dedican a diferentes actividades a la venta de artículos en el barrio en el cual residen, tanto en sus respectivos domicilios como recorriendo casa por casa para ofrecer sus productos en sus Comunidades, gracias a los años de experiencia son muy estrictas a la hora de admitir nuevas integrantes ya que que es un grupo muy selecto con señoras muy responsables con sus labores.
Una de las integrantes es la señora de Romina R. quien se dedica a la venta de prodcutos varios ya sea de merceria, ropas, utensilios para el hogar y otros.
Ella dependiendo de la ocacion adquiere las mercaderia para vender, asi como en esta ocacio que solicita el prestamo para la compra de juguetes ya que en este mes en Paraguay se recuerda el dia del niño y la demanda de juguetes aumente masivamente.
Todas las integrantes de  este grupo agradecen por la oportunidad que se les brinda con el crédito ya se les facilita el trabajo.
texts.en:
The Cañaberal committee was formed over a year ago. The women that comprise this group engage in different sales activities in the neighborhood where they live. They do business as much in their respective homes as they do going from door to door offering their products in their communities. Thanks to their years of experience, they are very strict when it comes to admitting new members. Each woman in this select group is very responsible with her work. One of the members is Romina R.. She sells various products such as sewing notions, clothes, and utensils for the home. She acquires her merchandise based on the occasion. This instance is no exception. She requests the loan to purchase toys because the Day of the Child is celebrated this month in Paraguay. The demand for toys increases massively. All the members of this group are thankful for the opportunity that the loan provides since it facilitates their work.

Translated from Spanish by Rachael Mossey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase toys

loans.name: Sol Naciente Group

texts.es:
Polet del Pilar tiene 20 años de edad, es una mujer luchadora (así se describe ella), que ha logrado salir adelante a pesar de la crisis económica, conviviente, con 1 hijo de 4 años de edad, su domicilio está ubicado en la zona de Ramiro Priale. Distrito de Ate, departamento de lima.
Trabaja  con EDAPROSPO – Prosperidad  desde hace 4 meses, asume el cargo de secretaria de la alcancía comunal “SOL NACIENTE” la cual está conformado por  10 socios quienes se dedican a diversas actividades como: venta de helados, venta de frituras, venta de productos de belleza, venta de golosinas, venta de ropas y otros. 
Polet del Pilar se dedica  a  la venta de ropa (niños y adolescentes) en forma ambulatoria (reparte sobre pedidos de sus clientes), desde hace 2 meses, anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de dulces y debido a que su madre enfermo y la operaron tuvo que cambiar de giro de negocio, su reciente préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería para iniciar la venta de salchipapas.
Gloria en el futuro anhela terminar su carrera de secretariado. (Niños en la foto hijos de los socios).
texts.en:
Polet del Pilar is a 20-year-old woman who is very strong-willed. Despite the economic crisis, she has managed to get ahead. She lives with her partner and their 4-year-old son in the zone of Ramiro Priale, in the district of Ate and department of Lima. For the last 4 months, she has been working with EDAPROSPO - Prosperidad. Also, she is the secretary of the communal bank "SOL NACIENTE", which is made up of 10 members who make a living in various activities, such as: selling ice cream, fried foods, beauty products, candy, clothing, and other items. Polet del Pilar has been selling childrens' clothing by request for 2 months, making deliveries to her clients. Previously, she had sold candy, but when her mother became sick and needed surgery, she had to change the direction of her business. Her recent loan will be invested in the purchase of merchandise to start selling hot dogs. In the future, she aspires to finish her secretarial degree.

Translated from Spanish by Mark Broscoe, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase merchandise to begin selling hotdogs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: For home improvements and some personal expenses

loans.name: Sarita Colonia Group

texts.es:
La señora Victoria Dionicia tiene 51 años de edad, conviviente, tiene dos hijos de 12 y 17 años, su domicilio está ubicado en Cajamarquilla, distrito de  Lurigancho - Chosica,  departamento de  Lima, se dedica al negocio de corte de cabello, desde hace 25 años, su estética lleva el nombre de “ESTETICA VICKY”, se inicio en este negocio ya que tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar cosmetología, logrando así la apertura de su estética, además también vende perfumes, dulces y bisutería.
Trabaja con EDAPROSPO – Prosperidad  desde hace 2 años y 6 meses, actualmente asume el cargo de tesorera de la  alcancía comunal “SARITA COLONIA” la cual está integrada por 7 socios quienes realizan diversas actividades como: comercio y servicios.
Su reciente préstamo será utilizado en la compra de mercadería como: líquidos, tintes, gaseosas y golosinas, para  seguir fidelizando y abasteciendo a sus clientes.
En el futuro anhela poder hacer  crecer su negocio y comprarse una casa. (Niños en la foto hijos de los socios).
texts.en:
Victoria Dionicia is 51 years old and lives with her two children who are 12 and 17 years old. She resides in Cajamarquilla, a district of Lurigancho-Chosica, which is a suburb of Lima. She has been cutting hair for 25 years and her beauty salon is named " Vicky's Beauty Salon". She got into the business after having the opportunity to study cosmetology which allowed her to achieve the opening of her beauty salon. She also sells perfumes, candy, and jewelry. She has been working with EDAPROSPO - for 2 1/2 years. She is currently the treasurer of the communal funds for SARITA COLONIA, which is made up of 7 associates who perform diverse activities in the commerce and service sector. The loan would be used to purchase merchandise like: liquids, dyes, soft drinks, and snacks in order to continue supplying their loyal customers. In the future she longs to grow her business and purchase a house. ( Kids pictured are children of the associates)

Translated from Spanish by Gustavo Gutierrez, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of merchandise like: liquids, dyes, soft drinks and snacks

loans.name: Juan Alberto

texts.es: Juan Alberto tiene 41 años, su actividad es la venta de medicina natural. Por lo que siempre busca la forma de mejorar sus ingresos y lo de su familia, el es una persona muy responsable y disfruta de su negocio. El trabaja todos los días de la semana desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche, por lo que tiene que montarse en los diferentes buses para ofrecer la variedad de productos. Este financiamiento es para la compra de medicina natural. Sueña con tener su propia farmacia.
texts.en:
Juan Alberto is 41 years old, he sells natural medicine. He is a responsible person who enjoys his business and is therefore always looking for ways to improve his earnings and those for his family. He works everyday of the week from 7AM to 7PM making his way through various buses in order to offer his various products. The loan is to purchase natural medicines. He dreams of having his own pharmacy.

Translated from Spanish by Gustavo Gutierrez, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Paso A Paso Group

texts.en:
Paola is the president of the loan group "Paso a Paso" (Step-by-Step), which consists of 17 associates from the city of Talca.  In the photo, Paula is in the second row, second from left to right, and is wearing a red jacket. 

Paola sells women's clothing and accessories. The accessories she offers include purses, belts, handkerchiefs, scarves, necklaces and rings. Paula sells from her home and in the business establishments of some of her clients: a clinic, a municipality, an institute of social preservation, and three hair salons. 

With this loan Paola intends to purchase seasonal clothing so her inventory is up-to-date.  Paola travels two times a month to purchase merchandise in Santiago (capital of Chile).  She dreams of having a boutique, ideally in her house so she can look after her children. She has three daughters, two-year-old twins and a 14-year-old daughter.  Paola also works at a supermarket stocking shelves, but she is unable to maintain a fixed schedule for this work as the health of one of her twins requires regular visits to the clinic. 

Fondo Esperanza is an important contributor to Paola's business and family, because as an independent business owner she can manage her time in ways that allows her to better accommodate the daily needs of her family. Paula also values the support and encouragement she receives from the loan officer and her fellow group members. The businesses of the other group members include the production and sales of empanadas, fast-food, salads, chocolates, home décor (bed sheets, curtains, table cloths, etc.), sale of coal, underwear, jewellery, clothing, and a blend of crafted accessories. 
 
Talca is in the Maule region, in the central part of the country.  The majority of the population lives in the rural area, and is dedicated primarily to activities related to rural production. Talca is also known for its beautiful colonial architecture and artisan goods. The area's main attractions are the flora, the fauna, and the vineyards. Despite the fact that the workforce and production in Talca has increased, according to the recent census, this area is still, unfortunately, one of the poorest in Chile.

loans.use: To purchase clothing inventory for spring and summer

loans.name: Pilar Del Socorro

texts.es:
PILAR DEL SOCORRO J. L. Trabajo como Administradora en la Universidad Nacional Autónoma de Nicaragua, ES MADRE DE FAMILIA DE DOS HIJOS Y ESTOS SE ENCUENTRAN EN EDAD ESCOLAR.
 el préstamo  en el sistema eléctrico de su casa de habitación y repellar algunas paredes de su casa de Habitación.
VA ACOMPRAR ARENA, CEMENTO Y CABLES ELECTRICOS.
texts.en:
Pilar Del Socorro J. L. works as an administrator in The Autonomous University of Nicaragua. She is also a mother with two school-aged children.

The loan will be used for the electronic system in her home and to plaster some walls. She plans on buying sand, cement, and electric cables.

Translated from Spanish by Susan Garza, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Improve her home by changing the electric system and plastering some walls.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luis, de 38 años de edad, convive con pareja y tiene dos hijos, Yudith y Luis de 12 y 4 años respectivamente. Juntos viven en la hermosa selva cusqueña, ubicada en la localidad de Villa Quintiarina, donde tienen su propia casa a base de adobe. A Luis siempre le ha encantado trabajar, es por ello que siempre cultiva y comercializa café a un precio competitivo, desde luego que sus ventas subieron y ante esto percibe buenas ganancias económicas. En el futuro espera ampliar su producción agrícola, para que pueda atender la demanda su producto de café sin ningún contratiempo. Normalmente trabaja por cuenta propia, pero en ocasiones recibe la ayuda de su esposo, solo que en temporada de sembrío y cosecha necesita de la ayuda de sus peones con el propósito de que puedan extraer su producto en menor tiempo y ofrecerlo a los grandes mayoristas. Este es su octavo crédito con MFP, por el cual se compromete a seguir pagando durante las fechas pactadas, además está contento con banco comunal, debido a las buenas decisiones que realizan. Con el crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de insumos y abono, para dar un mantenimiento adecuado a sus plantaciones de café.
texts.en:
Luis is 38 years old, lives with his partner, and has two children; Yudith and Luis who are 12 and 4 years old respectively. Together they live in the beautiful forest in Cusco located in the town of Villa Quintiarina where they own their own adobe house. Luis has always loved working which is why he grows and sells coffee at a competitive price. Since his sales increased he receives good profits. In the future he hopes to increase his agricultural production to fulfill the demand of his coffee product without any setbacks. Normally he works on his own but occasionally receives help from his wife. In sowing season he needs fellow workers to help him extract his product in the least time possible and offer it to large wholesalers. This is his eighth loan with MFP and he commits to continue paying off the scheduled payments. In addition, he is thankful for the communal bank for the good decisions they make. With the loan he is requesting he plans to buy supplies and fertilizer to adequately maintain his coffee plantation.

Translated from Spanish by Susan Garza, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy ferilizer for his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “DINAMICO”; La socia vive en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia  y  departamento de Cusco.
	
La socia es la Sra. Manuela; ella tiene 59 años de edad y la socia es conviviente,  ella tiene 3 hijos, La socia a administrar su agencia de viajes, la socia es dueña de la agencia de viajes y turismo Cusco - Maravilla del Mundo; desde el año 2006, La socia se dedica a comprar mediante pre pagos los boletos de tren, también, los hoteles y restaurantes; Ella solicita el préstamo para pagar sus pre pagos en los diferentes servicios. 

La  socia valora y agradece el crédito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer y tener una mejor calidad de vida, así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the "DINAMICO" ("Dynamic") communal bank. She lives in the Huanchac district, in the province and department of Cusco. This borrower is Ms. Manuela. She is 59 years old and lives with her partner. She has 3 children and manages a travel agency. She is the owner of the "Maravilla del Mundo" ("Wonder of the World") Cusco travel and tourism agency. Since 2006, she has worked buying pre-paid train tickets, hotel rooms, and restaurant meals. She is requesting this loan to pre-pay for these different services. This borrower values and is grateful for the loan offered to her, as it will allow her to grow and to have a better quality of life. She also promises to comply with the repayment of her loan according to the established plan.

Translated from Spanish by Katie Kavanagh, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to pre-pay for various travel services (train tickets, hotel rooms, and restaurant meals)

loans.name: Maxima Audely

texts.es: Máxima Audely tiene 44 años. Es madre soltera, Su actividad económica es la venta de productos varios. Hace más de 10 años que se dedica a este humilde oficio. Por lo que no solamente se dedica a la venta de ropa si no que también a la venta de comida, ella es muy luchadora y siempre le ha gustado innovar en negocios pues ha sido productivo.  Ella tiene mucho tiempo de trabajar con Fundación por lo que ha sido muy gratificante para ella. Por lo que sus inicios han sido muy difíciles y con mucho empeño es que ha salido adelante. Este crédito es para la compra de materia prima necesaria para su negocio.
texts.en:
Maxima Audely is a 44 year old single mother. Her form of income is by selling various products; an occupation she has been dedicated to for more than 10 years. Not only does she sell clothes but she also sells food. She is a fighter and has always enjoyed business innovation which has turned out to be productive. She has been working with the lender, Leon Foundation, for a long time which has been very gratifying for her. Her start was very difficult and she has been able to get ahead due to her determination. This loan is for the purchase of raw material needed for her business.

Translated from Spanish by Gustavo Gutierrez, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Regalo De Dios Group

texts.es:
el grupo Regalo de Dios esta integrado por tres personas humildes y trabajadoras, que desean obtener capital de trabajo para invertir en sus negocios. a continuacion se detallan las diferentes actividades que ellos realizan:

 
el señor Benito R. G. tiene 49 años de edad, vive en union libre con la señora Maria Teodora Fuentes Anariba quien es ama de casa y vende charamuscas de frutas. don Benito se dedica desde hace 5 años a vender frescos, leña y maiz.
Ademas trabaja por la noches en una escuela como guardia de seguridad.


don Benjamin Moreno tiene 48 años de edad, esta casado con la señora Maria Fatima Bonilla con quien han procreado 6 hijos, tres de ellos dependen de el, 
Benjamin se dedica al cultivo de maiz, venta de leña seca para consumo domestico y venta de vacas.
el credito lo utilizara para comprar leña.


el señor Dionicio V. M. tiene 49 años de edad, esta casado y tiene 7 hijos, cuatro de ellos
dependen de el, los otros ya trabajan y aportan al hogar, Dionicio se dedica desde hace 5 años
al cultivo de maiz para la venta, venta de leña por carretadas puestas en el lugar. 
tambien cria cerdos, los engorda y luego los vende.
el credito lo utilizara para comprar leña.
 
todos ellos son personas muy humildes, serias, trabajadoras y que desean obtener capital para trabajar y salir adelante con sus familias.
texts.en:
The Group, Regalo de Dios ( Gift of God) is made up of three humble and working people who wish to obtain working capital to invest in their businesses. The following details the different activities each of them perform. Benito R. G. is 49 years old. He lives in a common-law marriage with Maria Teodora Fuentes Anariba who is a housewife and sells fruit popsicles. Benito has been selling soft drinks, firewood, and corn for the last 5 years and aside from that he also moonlights as a security guard at a school. Benjamin Moreno is 48 years old and is married to Maria Fatima Bonilla whom with he has 6 children, three of which are dependent on him. Benjamin cultivates corn, sells dry firewood for domestic use and also sells cows. He would use the loan to purchase firewood. Dionicio V. M. is 49 years old, is married, and has 7 children. Four of the children are dependent on him and the rest work and contribute to the household. Dionicio has been cultivating corn for the last 5 years to sell along with firewood sold on site in carts. He also raises pigs, plumps them up and then sells them. He would use the loan to purchae firewood. Every one of them are humble people, serious, and hard-working who wish to obtain working capital to get ahead with their families.

Translated from Spanish by Gustavo G., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase soft drinks, firewood, and corn

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Reyna  De Los Ángeles

texts.es: La señora Reyna  de los Ángeles F. B., tiene más de 34 años, con su esposo y sus 2 hijos pequeños habitan en el Barrio Laureles Norte, ellos habitan en una humilde casa, la cual ha sido construida por el esfuerzo de su esposo el cual es Ingeniero Industrial y con sus ahorros apoya la obra y fusiona como el soporte económico de la familia. Pero ahora solicitan un préstamo para la compra de materiales de construcción, para edificar un muro en la sala principal de su casa que divida las áreas de estar, brinde seguridad y fuerza a la infraestructura de su vivienda, esta inversión le traería mejores condiciones y comodidades para habitar, y la satisfacción paternal de ofrecerle  a sus hijos un hogar digno donde desarrollar sus días venideros.
texts.en:
Reyna de los Ángeles F. B. has been with her husband for more than 34 years. They and her two young children live in a humble home in the Laureles Norte neighborhood. The house was built with great effort from her husband, who is an industrial engineer. He provides financial support for his family through his earnings. They are asking for this loan in order to buy building materials to build a wall in their living room and bring more security and strength to the infrastructure of their house. This improvement will also offer better living conditions and comfort and will provide the parental satisfaction of having given their children a dignified home for their future development.

Translated from Spanish by Hugo Reyes, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Home improvement

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Building materials

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “DINAMICO”; La socia vive en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia  y  departamento de Cusco.
	
La socia es la Sra. Hilda; ella tiene 44 años de edad y la socia es conviviente,  y tiene 3 hijos, ella se dedica al comercio minorista, la socia alterna sus actividades del hogar con la venta de frutas en el mercado de huancaro La socia alquiló un stand y ella suele comprar fruta de los proveedores mayoristas y los vende en su puesto.  La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de frutas.

La  socia valora y agradece el crédito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer y tener una mejor calidad de vida, así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
She is a member of the communal bank "DYNAMIC". She lives in Huanchac district in the province and region of Cusco. Ms. Hilda is 44 years old and is married with three children. Retail is her profession and she alternates her household duties with selling fruit at the Huancaro market. She rents a booth and usually buys fruit from wholesale suppliers to sell at her post. She is requesting the loan to buy fruit. She values and appreciates the credit extended as it allows her to grow and have a better quality of life. She is committed to complying with the repayment of her loan on time.

Translated from Spanish by Andrea Kellogg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: She request the loan to buy wholesale fruits

loans.name: Misael

texts.es: Misael, de 34 años de edad, es soltero y no tiene hijo alguno. Reside en la hermosa selva cusqueña, ubicada en la comunidad de Villa Quintiarina, donde tiene su propio techo a base de madera. Siempre admiro a sus padres, por el arduo t5rabajo que realizaron para salir adelante, a pesar que vivían una época de carencias económicas. Actualmente se dedica a la agricultura, cultivando cacao, haciendo que cada día mejore su producción, por el cual sus clientes siempre quedan satisfechos, es así que sus ventas mejoraron paulatinamente. Normalmente trabaja por cuenta propia, pero ocasionalmente recibe la ayuda de su familia, con la finalidad de que lo puedan extraer su producto de cacao y de esta manera pueda venderlos en los centros de acopio de su comunidad. En el futuro piensa comprar más terrenos de cultivo con la necesidad de que pueda mejorar su calidad de vida. Este es su cuarto crédito con MFP, por el cual asegura cumplir fielmente con su cronograma de pagos, además se siente fortalecido con banco comunal, debido al compañerismo que existe en cada uno de los socios. Con el crédito que solicita lo piensa invertir en darle mantenimiento adecuado a sus plantaciones de cacao, para ello comprará insumos y abono.
texts.en:
Misael, 34, is single and has no children. He lives in the beautiful jungle near Cusco, in the community of Villa Quintiarina, where he has his own wooden house. He always admired his parents for the hard work they did to get ahead in life, despite living in a time of economic hardship. Misael is a cacao farmer, working to improve his production everyday, for which reason his customers are always satisfied. This is how his sales gradually improved. Normally he does the work himself, but on occasion he receives his family's help with extracting the cocoa beans from the cacao so they can sell it in the community's collection centers. He is thinking of buying more farmland in the future so that he can improve his quality of life. This is Misael's fourth loan with MFP, so he promises to follow his payment schedule faithfully. He feels strengthened by his communal bank because of the comradeship that exists among all the members. He intends to invest this loan to adequately maintain his cacao fields, and to do this, he will buy supplies and fertilizer.

Translated from Spanish by Danielle Maxson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Fertilizer for cacao fields

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “DINAMICO”; La socia vive en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia  y  departamento de Cusco.
	
La socia es la Sra. María; ella tiene 41 años de edad y la socia es conviviente,  y la socia tiene 4 hijos, ella se dedica al comercio minorista, la socia vende verduras en el mercado de ttio ella tiene un stand propio, La socia alterna sus actividades del hogar con la venta de verduras, ella compra de los proveedores al por mayor y los vende en su stand a los clientes en forma de raciones llamados manojos. La socia solicita el préstamo para incrementar su negocio y poder comprar mayor cantidad y diversidad de verduras.

La  socia valora y agradece el crédito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer y tener una mejor calidad de vida, así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the communal bank called Dinamico. She lives in the district of Huanchac in the province of Cusco, Peru, with her husband and 4 children. Maria sells vegetables from her own small stand in the market. She alternates her household activities with her work, buying from wholesalers and then selling the vegetables in small batches from her stand. Maria is requesting a loan to grow her business, by purchasing a greater variety and quantity of vegetables. She values and appreciates the loans she has been granted, as they allow her to grow her business and improve her quality of life. She commits to make the payments on time and comply with the terms of the loan.

Translated from Spanish by Emily Charnes, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase a greater quantity and variety of vegetables which she sells from her small stand in the market

loans.name: Digna Del Carmen

texts.es:
DIGNA DEL CARMEN V. J., Trabaja como Conserje  en el Instituto Manuel Olivares Rodríguez.
Toda la plata que ha trabajado  con Ceprodel  la ha utilizado en el mejoramiento de su casa de habitación, .

ES MADRE SOLTERA DE DOS HIJOS Y ESTOS SE ENCUENTRAN EN EDAD ESCOLAR, EL PRESTAMO SOLICITADO ES PARA LA COMPRA DE MATERIALES DE CONSTRUCCION COMO: ZINC, MADERA Y CEMENTO Y ARENA PARA CAMBIAR EL TECHO DE SU CASA Y REFORZAR LAS PAREDES.
texts.en:
Digna Del Carmen V. J. is the single mother of two school-aged children and works as a counselor in the Manuel Olivares Ramirez institution. She has used all of the money that she has gotten through Ceprodel to make improvements to her home. She will use the money from this loan to buy building materials, such as zinc metal sheeting, lumber, cement and sand so that she can replace her roof and reinforce the walls.

Translated from Spanish by Hugo Reyes, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Home repair

loans.name: Lilliam Del Socorro

texts.es: Lilliam Del Socorro tiene 49 años, es una madre de familia muy trabajadora y alegre, tiene 1 hijo de edad. A partir de ciertos problemas familiares ella busca la forma como generar ingresos y lo realiza con la venta de mercadería en general, Sus mayores ventas son el calzad y la ropa, donde la mayoría de sus clientes son jóvenes. Han transcurrido 9 años con este negocio y se siente más tranquila por su estabilidad económica. Este crédito es para la compra de perfumes, calzado, ropa y tratamientos, por lo que se compromete a seguir siendo muy puntual, ya que sabe lo beneficioso que será para que aumente su capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Lilliam Del Socorro is 49 years old. She is a hardworking and cheerful mother and wife. She has one minor child. Due to certain family problems she has sought a way to generate income and she does so by selling general merchandise. Most of her sales are in shoes and clothes, and most of her customers are young people. She has been at this business for 9 years and she feels very content with her financial stability. This loan is to buy perfumes, shoes, and treatments. She is committed to making the payments on time, since she knows how beneficial it is for increasing her working capital.

Translated from Spanish by Ellen Donohue, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Rolando

texts.es: Rolando, de 41 años de edad, convive con su pareja y tiene cuatro hijos en etapa escolar. Juntos residen en la comunidad de Villa Quintiarina, ubicada en hermosa selva  tropical peruana, donde tiene su propia casa a base de adobe. Rolando, recuerda mucho que desde su adolescencia le encantaba vender el  producto de cacao que sus padres cultivaban. Hoy tiene su propio negocio agrícola, además sus clientes están más que contentos por el producto que les brinda y a un precio razonable. Por lo general trabaja por cuenta propia, pero en temporada de sembrío y cosecha tiene a cargo de sus peones, para que de esa manera puedan facilitarlo en la extracción y traslado de su producto de cacao hacia los centros de acopio de su  comunidad. En el futuro anhela ampliar su producción para adquirir nuevos terrenos de cultivo, con el propósito de que pueda aumentar sus ventas de manera considerable. Este es su quinto crédito con MFP, por el cual se compromete a seguir pagando con sus respectivas cuotas, además se siente contento con su banco comunal, ya que todos los socios están comprometidos. Con el crédito que solicita lo piensa invertir en la compra, de insumos y abono, con la finalidad de que le dé un cuidado adecuado a sus plantaciones de cacao.
texts.en:
Rolando is 41 years old. He lives with his spouse and has four school-age children. They live in the community of Villa Quintiarina, located in the beautiful tropical jungle of Peru. They have their own house there made of adobe. Rolando remembers that since his adolescence he has loved selling the cacao that his parents grew. Today he has his own farming business and his customers are very happy with the product that he offers at a reasonable price. In generalm, he works on his own, but during the planting and harvesting seasons, he works with laborers so that they can facilitate the extraction and transport the cacao product to the warehousing centers in the community. In the future, he hopes to expand his production to adquire more arable land so that he can increase his sales considerably. This is his fifth loan with MFP and he is committed to continue making the respective payments. In addition, he is happy with his communal bank, since all og the members are dedicated. With the loan that he is asking for he plans on buying materials and fertilizer so that he can adequately care for his cacao plantings.

Translated from Spanish by Ellen Donohue, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer to improve the quality of cacao that he produces.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es: Víctor, de 50 años de edad, convive con su  pareja y tienen cuatro hijos. Juntos residen en la comunidad de Villa Quintiarina, ubicada en la selva tropical peruana, donde tiene propia casa a base de madera. Víctor quería estudiar la carrera de agronomía, pero por motivos económicos no pudo concretizar su sueño. Solamente se aferró al único trabajo que tiene que es cultivar cacao, producto por el cual tiene mucha demanda además que recibe buenas rentas económicas. Por lo general la ayuda su pareja y sus hijos, pero en temporada de cosecha contrata peones para que faciliten la recolección de su cacao, que luego serán vendidos en los centros de acopio de su comunidad. Su plan a futuro es remodelar su casa a base de material noble, para que de esa manera se sientan cómoda su familia. Este es su octavo crédito con MFP, por el cual se compromete a seguir cumpliendo con su cronograma de pagos, además confía en su grupo comunal, porque todos se ayudan entre si. Con el crédito que solicita, cumplirá con los pagos que tenia pendiente con sus peones.
texts.en:
Víctor is 50 years old, and he lives with his life partner. They have four children. They live in the Villa Quintiarina community, which is located in the Peruvian tropical forest. They have their own house there; it is made of wood. Víctor wanted to study for a degree in agriculture. For financial reasons he could not make his dream come true. He took up the only work that he has, which is cultivating cacao. There is great demand for this product, and he receives good income from it. His wife and children usually help him. However, during the season for harvesting he hires laborers to facilitate the gathering of his cacao. It will be sold later in the local collection centers. His plan for the future is to remodel his house with sturdy material. That way his family will be comfortable. This is his eighth loan with MFP. He pledges to continue making his payments on time. He trusts his communal bank because everyone helps each other. He will use the requested loan to make the outstanding payments to his laborers.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Pay his laborers

loans.name: Danilo Antonio

texts.es: El señor Danilo Antonio L. H.,  es un joven de 27 años casado habitante del Barrio Los Martinez, su esposa realiza las actividades del hogar, tienen dos hijos pequeños, y el mayorcito estudia la primaria, El señor Danilo se dedica a la venta de verduras y frutas, ellos habitan en un humilde hogar que necesita remodelar y mejorar las condiciones en las que actualmente viven, pero necesita aumentar sus utilidades para llevar a cabo esta visión, es por esta razón que solicita un préstamo para la compra de una mayor inventario de frutas y verduras , que incrementen el volumen de las ventas que prosperen sus condiciones de vida, y economía para el bienestar de su familia, pero sobre todo para sus dos pequeños que están en una etapa de crecimiento y que como padres espera ofrecer a sus hijos a un mejor porvenir.
texts.en:
Danilo Antonio L. H. is a 27 year old young man. He is married and lives in the Los Martinez neighborhood. His wife is a homemaker and they have two young children; the oldest attends elementary school. Danilo sells fruits and vegetables and they all live in a humble home that needs remodeling to improve the living conditions under which they currently live, but he needs help to achieve this vision. It’s for this reason that he is requesting this loan, in order to buy large quantities of fruits and vegetables, which will allow him to increase his sales, the living conditions and financial state of his family, and above all [benefit] his two children, who are in their developmental stage and as a father he wants to give them a better future.

Translated from Spanish by Hugo Reyes, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Inventory

loans.name: Las Palmeras Group

texts.es:
El Bancomunal Las Palmeras inicia su ciclo 5 con 14 socias, las socias pertenecen al departamento D. Huancavelica donD. L. actividad económica principal es el comercio.
Victoria es socia del Bancomunal, es casada, tiene 3 hijos jóvenes D. 29, 27 y 19 años D. edad. Victoria inició su negocio con una mini tienda y con poco capital, con el sueldo que recibía del Magisterio fue invirtiendo D. a pocos, ahora tiene una bodega surtida con productos D. primera necesidad, gracias a los prestamos que recibe pueD. invertir en mayor cantidad D. productos compra al por amyor.
texts.en:
The “Las Palmeras” (The Palms) Communal Bank is starting its fifth cycle with 14 members. The members belong to the Huancavelica department, where the main economic activity is commerce. Victoria is a member of the communal bank. She is married and has three children who are 29, 27, and 19 years old. Victoria started her business with a mini store and a little capital. She was slowly investing in the business with the money that she gets from teaching. Now she has a grocery store that is stocked with basic needs items. Thanks to the loans she gets she will be able to buy products in greater quantities for wholesale prices.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy rice, sugar, and oil

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
Fernando T. es  de la ciudad de Carapeguá, tiene 21 años y  está cursando el 3° año de la carrera de Ciencias Agropecuaria en la Universidad de San Lorenzo (UNISAL) de la ciudad de Carapeguá.

El es hijo único en la familia. Su madre es comerciante junto con su padre.

Fernando actualmente trabaja vendiendo balanceados y también ayuda a sus padres, donde se encuentra adquiriendo experiencia y al mismo tiempo obtiene un ingreso para sus estudios.

Sus padres se dedican al faenamiento de caballos por lo que él viaja hasta a San Ignacio Misiones para la compra de caballos y con el viaje aprovecha y vende sus balanceados lo realiza por la ciudad y algunas compañías.

Fernando tiene muchos deseos de terminar su carrera y montar su propio negocio, para a contar con un buen ingreso y ayudar a su familia, ya que es el único hijo en la familia, especialmente a su madre quien es una mujer muy sacrificada, comenta Fernando.

El solicita el préstamo para el pago de la mensualidad de su facultad y también para la compra de libros que está necesitando para estudiar.

Fernando agradece este préstamo ya que le ayudará en su estudio y al mismo tiempo podrá contar con referencias crediticias que en el futuro será  de mucha importancia para concretar sus proyectos.
texts.en:
Fernando T., age 21, is from the city of Carapeguá. He is in his third year of studying the career of Agricultual Sciences in the University of San Lorenzo (UNISAL), which is in the city of Carapeguá. He is an only child. His mother works with his father as a merchant. Fernando currently works selling balanced feed. He also helps his parents, which gives him experience and income for his studies at the same time. His parents slaughter horses. He travels to San Ignacio Misiones to buy horses, and he takes advantage of the trip to sell his balanced feed in the city and to some companies. Fernando has a great desire to finish his studies and establish his own business. He will do this to have good income and to help his family because he is an only child. Fernando says that he especially wants to help his mother who is very self-sacrificing. He is requesting a loan to make the monthly payment for his school. He will also buy books that he needs to study. Fernando is grateful for this loan because it will help him with his studies. At the same time he will be able to get credit references, which will be very important to his future plans.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Pay monthly fees and to buy books

loans.name: Sergio Fabian

texts.es:
El Sr. Sergio  tiene25 años y esta viviendo con sus Padres, desde pequeño empezó a trabajar con  su Padres en la Profesión de Chaperia y Pinturas de Camiones  y automóviles en el Taller    donde aprendio el oficio y luego fue tomando cursos de capacitación   para especializarse en este campo.  
El Sr. G. sigue trabando con su Padre en el mismo Local que alquilan juntos y prácticamente comparten  todos los gastos  fijos los dividen en dos, pero cada uno tiene sus propia Clientela formada como el caso de nuestro cliente que esta trabajando actualmente con tres Casas de Seguros de Automoviles.                  
El Crédito que retiro es para la compra de Materiales  como Oxigeno, Electrodo, Carburo para la parte de Caperia y para la Parte de Pintura, Masillas sinteticas Pinturas y Varniz.                                                
Con el tiempo  piensan comprar  el local donde estan alquilando ya que esta bien preparado par su trabajo porque cuenta con gran espacio para los vehiculos y un gran tinglado.
texts.en:
Sergio is 25 years old and living with his parents. He began working with them, doing body work and painting on cars and trucks, in the workshop where he learned this trade. He later took courses so that he could specialize in this area. Mr. G. continues to work with his father. They lease a workshop together and share all fixed expenses, dividing them in two, but each of them have their own established customers. Our associate is currently working with three different automobile insurance companies. He is asking for this loan in order to buy supplies such as oxygen, electrodes, carbide for paint and body work, synthetic putty, paint, and varnish. They eventually plan to buy the workshop that they lease because it’s well set up for their work. There is there is lots of space for vehicles and includes a large platform.

Translated from Spanish by Hugo Reyes, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Materials and supplies

loans.name: Yelena

texts.en:
Yelena is married with grown children. She lives and works in Kahovka, in the south-eastern part of Ukraine. Yelena has been in the clothing sales business for 12 years. Just as many other small entrepreneurs at that time, Yelena started her venture because she didn’t have any other way to provide for her family’s needs. 

Yelena has been successful in this business. She says this venture gives her opportunity to support her family, which makes all the hard work worth the income she is making. This time Yelena is requesting a 10,000 Grivnyas loan to increase the assortment of items she offers. She hopes to increase her income and spend it for her family needs.

loans.use: To increase variety of items to sell

loans.name: José María

texts.es:
El Sr. José María G. de 33 años de edad, se encuentra casado con la Sra. Mariela  Ríos  de 34 años con quien tiene 2 hijas, Florencia de 6 años de edad quien se encuentra en el Pre-Escolar y otra hija recién nacida. 
El Sr. José posee una vidriería desde hace más de 5 años, negocio el cual se encuentra en uno de los salones del Sportivo Iteño, un club deportivo muy conocido de la ciudad. Este negocio lo maneja con su padre y uno de sus hermanos, posee una buena cantidad de clientes ya que su padre anteriormente manejaba este negocio y posteriormente el Sr. José quedó como dueño y administrador del local, realizan trabajos como enmarcados, espejos, cristaleros, exhibidores, etc.
El Sr. José solicitó el crédito para la ampliación del local. 
La foto fue tomada en su lugar de trabajo y es el primero de hacia la izquierda que aparece en la misma.
texts.en:
Jose Maria Gonzalez, 33, is married to Mariela Rios, 34, with whom he has 2 daughters: Florencia, 6, who is in pre-school and another newborn daughter. Jose has had a glass workshop for more than 5 years. His business is located in one of the rooms of the "Sportivo Iteño," a sports club that is well-known in the city. He manages this business with his father and one of his brothers. They have a large number of customers, since his father previously managed the business and later Jose became the owner and manager. They do work such as framed mirrors, wardrobes with glass doors, glass display cases, etc. Jose requests a loan to expand his business premises. The photograph was taken in his place of work, and he is the first person who appears on the left side.

Translated from Spanish by Lisa Grobar, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to expand his business

loans.name: Adriana María

texts.es:
En el mercado Mayoreo de Managua, la señora Adriana A. es propietaria de una pequeña ferretería donde ofrece todo tipo de productos en el ramo atendiendo una cantidad de clientes por lo que busca la manera de cubrir sus demandas de productos ferreteros.

Hoy en día, solicita el crédito para la compra de los productos ferreteros entre los que se encuentran zinc, perlines, pintura y tubería. Para esto espera que su crédito le sea otorgado y de esta manera proceder a la compra a los proveedores de estos productos.
texts.en:
Adriana A. owns a small hardware store in Managua's wholesale market. She offers all kinds of hardware products to her clients. She strives to please them by satisfying their needs through her inventory purchases. She now requests the loan to purchase hardware products such as zinc metal sheets, crossbeams, paint and tubing. She hopes her loan will be granted and she will be able to purchase the products from her vendors.

Translated from Spanish by Betyna Almeida-Covarrubias, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of hardware

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es: El Señor Santiago nacio en Chuquisaca el 23 de mayo de 1983 hace 19 años que vive en la localidad de  Nueva Esperanza Municipio de El Torno se dedica a la agricultura y produce carbon, su hijos estan estudian en la comunidad donde vive junto a su esposa quien le ayuda a comercializar sus productos en el mercado de el Torno, tambien se dedica a la crianza de animales para despues poder venderlos, su deseo o sueño del Sr. es salir adelante en la agricultura comprar equipos para poder mantener mejor su cultivos, con el dinero del credito contratara mano de obra para la preparacion de la tierra para la siembra de Maiz, esta muy agradecido con la institucion por el apoyo brindado en la otorgacion del credito.
texts.en:
Santiago was born in Chuquisaca on May 23rd of 1983. He has lived in the town of Nueva Esperanza in the El Torno municipality for 19 years. He devotes himself to agriculture, and he makes charcoal. His children go to school in the community where he lives. He lives with his wife who helps him sell his products in the El Torno market. He also raises animals to later be able to sell them. His wish or dream is to get ahead in agriculture and buy equipment to be able to improve his crops. He will use the loan to hire workers to prepare the land for planting corn. He is very grateful to the institution for the support of the loan.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Prepare the land and plant corn

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase of shoes and clothing

loans.name: Yoel

texts.es: Yoel, de 29 años de edad, es soltero y no tiene hijo alguno. Él vive en la comunidad de Villa Quintiarina, ubicada en la ceja de la selva peruana, donde tiene su propia casa a base de madera. El negocio al que se dedica es, la producción y comercialización de cacao, es por ello que agradece eternamente a su familia por el apoyo incondicional que le brindaron, ya que sin ello no iba a dar el gran paso. Hoy tiene una cantidad considerable de hectáreas y con las ganancias que percibe lo está devolviendo esos favores que lo hicieron a su persona, además sus compradores están satisfechos por la calidad del producto. El secreto de su éxito radica en la confianza y perseverancia que tiene, es por ello que trabaja arduamente a partir de las 7:00 de la mañana hasta las 6:00 de la tarde. Usualmente vende lo cosechado a los centros de acopio de su misma comunidad y en un futuro próximo anhela seguir ampliando su producción agrícola, con la finalidad de que pueda aumentar sus ventas y de esa forma mejorar su calidad de vida. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, por el cual se compromete a pagar de manera puntual, además augura en tendrá buenos beneficios en su banco comunal. Con el crédito que solicita lo piensa invertir en darle mantenimiento adecuado a sus plantaciones de cacao, para ello comprará insumos y abono.
texts.en:
Twenty-nine-year-old Yoel is single and has no children. He lives in the Villa Quintiarina community, located on the "ceja de la selva" (eyebrow of the jungle on the east slope of the Andes mountains), where he has his own house made of wood. He grows and sells cocoa and is eternally grateful to his family for their unconditional help. Without their help, he could never have succeeded. Today he cultivates a considerable amount of land, and with his earnings, he is returning the favors that were given to him. In addition, his customers are happy with the quality of his product. The secret of his success is rooted in his confidence and perseverance. He works hard from seven in the morning until six in the evening. He usually sells his harvest in the market center of his community. In the future, he wishes to continue increasing agricultural production and sales and, in this way, improve his standard of living. This is his first loan from MFP. He is committed to making timely repayments. He also feels he will get many benefits from his communal bank. By purchasing feritlizer and other agricultural consumables, he will invest the loan proceeds in the maintenance of his cocoa plantings.

Translated from Spanish by Jeff Schell, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase fertilizer to improve the quality of cocoa he produces.

loans.name: Basilia Del Carmen

texts.es:
En el Mercado Mayoreo, la señora Basilia del Carmen L. se dedica a la venta de verduras como papas, cebollas, chiltomas y otros. Es una dama que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y por preocuparse por llevar el sustento a su casa de habitación con el fin de beneficiar a su familia.

Con el crédito solicitado logrará la compra de las papas, cebollas, chiltomas y otras verduras para continuar ofertándolas en su localidad y así favorecer a sus clientes que le visitan a diario.
texts.en:
Basilia L. sells vegetables such as potatoes, onions, bell peppers and others in Managua's wholesale market. She is a hardworking woman who is busy supporting her home to benefit her family. She will use the requested loan to purchase potatoes, onions, bell peppers and other vegetables. She wants to continue to offer such vegetables in her shop and to please the costumers who visit her every day.

Translated from Spanish by Betyna Almeida-Covarrubias, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of vegetables

loans.name: Gabriela

texts.es: La Sra. Gabriela, trabaja con un taller de lavado de autos y cambio de aceite y mantenimiento de transportes, ella solicito este crédito, ya que alquilo otro ambiente más favorable para su actividad por la zona de Cota Cota, ella vive en la casa de sus cuñados por la urbanización virgen de Copacabana, más conocida por Codavisa, allí tiene todavía parte de su mercadería y la atención de otros clientes, que antes atendía, este negocio lo atiende su cuñada, la Sra. Gabriela tiene un esposo que trabaja en el interior de la republica, tienen dos hijos que ella los mantiene y controla, la Sra. Es una persona muy trabajadora  e inquieta en sus actividades, con el dinero del credito comprara mercadería como lubricantes y también un motor para utilizar en el lavado de autos, la Sra. esta muy agradecida por la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en:
Miss Gabriela works at a car wash, oil change and maintenance shop. She lives in the home of her brother- and sister-in-law in the Virgen de Copacabana development, which is best known for the Codavisa area, and she rents a shop in the Cota Cota zone, a more favourable location for her business. She still has some of her merchandise and customers, but her sister-in-law now attends to them. Gabriela has a husband who works in the interior of the country. They have two children whom she cares for. She is a very hard-working woman who is eager to work. With this loan she will purchase merchandise such as lubricants and also a motor to use in the car wash. She is very grateful for the offered opportunity.

Translated from Spanish by Christine Cooper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: the purchase of lubricants and a car wash machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy papayas and passion fruit

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy papayas and passion fruit

loans.name: Diosnel

texts.es:
El señor Diosnel tiene 61 años de edad, es separado, tiene hijos ya mayores de edad e independientes a él, vive en el barrio denominado Calle Ybaté de la ciudad de Itá.
Posee un puesto comercial en el mercado municipal de la ciudad hace mas de 20 años, allí realiza la venta de diversos artículos como ser bazar, regalos, juguetes, bijouteri y artículos de  santería.
Solicita el préstamo en esta ocasión para surtir sus artículos de juguetería con la compra de camioncitos, pelotas, muñecas, mochilas y otros juguetes atendiendo que se acerca el día del niño y en esta época tiene mucha venta.
El señor Diosnel demuestra ser una persona muy seria, responsable y trabajadora, manifiesta que dichas ganas de trabajar lo trae desde muy joven ya que proviene de una familia muy humilde que siempre le inculcó la responsabilidad.
Gracias a esta profesión mejoró su nivel de vida y  ayudó a sus hijos a  estudiar y que puedan ser personas útiles a su comunidad
texts.en:
61-year old Sr. Diosnel is separated and has grown-up children who have left home. He lives in the neighbourhood of Calle Ybaté in the town of Itá. He has run a stall in the municipal market for more than 20 years where he sells various items such as giftware, toys, jewelry, and religious articles. Diosnel is seeking a loan to increase his stock of toys. He wishes to buy small trucks, balls, dolls, backpacks, and other toys in preparation for the Day of the Child when business is brisk. He has proven to be a serious, responsible, hardworking person who has been keen to work ever since he was very young. He comes from a simple family who has always taught him to be responsible. Through hard work Diosnel has improved his standard of living and helped his children get an education so that they could be useful members of the community.

Translated from Spanish by Jane Agg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy toys, jewelry etc. for his market stall

loans.name: Juan Ignacio

texts.es:
El señor Juan Ignacio V. C. tiene 27 años de edad, es un joven  soltero, bachiller en humanidades, vive en la ciudad de Cochabamba.

Actualmente se dedica a la actividad de promotor-consultor para la Empresa de telecomunicaciones TIGO, capturando personas para la utilización de servicios de celular, internet y adquisición de aparatos, haciéndolos clientes de dicha Compañía. Su trabajo es caminar por las zonas más concurridas de la ciudad y ofrecer o comercializar los productos y servicios que brinda dicha institución. Sus ganancias no son fijas mas por no tener aun una profesión solo percibe un Porcentaje mínimo de sus ventas, lo cual cubre sus gastos universitarios y suficientes para su alimentación. El Sr. Juan Ignacio V., es un joven muy  emprendedor, que esta constante búsqueda de superación, pero necesita que confíen en él. 

El Sr. Juan Ignacio solicito el crédito para poder adquirir una computadora que le facilitará mucho el trabajo que realiza actualmente siendo más eficiente en su trabajo, además necesita para poder realizar sus trabajos universitarios. Es una persona que quiere superarse y retomará la universidad en la carrera de administración de empresas.
texts.en:
Juan Ignacio V. C. is 27 years old, single, has earned a bachelor’s degree in humanities, and lives in the city of Cochabamba. He currently works as a promoter-consultant for the telecommunication company, TIGO, bringing in new cellular and internet customers, and selling devices. His job is to walk through the busiest part of town, offering company services and products. His income is not set; he receives a small commission on his sales, which are enough to cover the cost of his university tuition and food. Juan is a very entrepreneurial young man who is constantly in search of ways to succeed, but he needs people to believe in him. Juan requested this loan in order to buy a computer that will make his work much easier. He will also be able to use it for his university work. He is one who wants to succeed and wants to take university courses in business administration.

Translated from Spanish by Hugo Reyes, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Computer for work and study

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: BUYING GROCERIES FOR HER STORE AND COFFEE SHOP

loans.name: Santo Domingo Group

texts.es: El Bancomunal Santo Domingo inicia su ciclo 38 con 13 socias que pertenecen al departamento D. Huancavelica. Saturnina es una D. la socias del Bancomunal, es conviviente y tiene 6 hijos el mayor D. 23 años y el menor D. 12, todos están estudiando actualmente, Saturnina tiene una cevicheria que atienD. en un puesto en el mercado D. la localidad, se inicio en el negocio con poco capital, poco a poco lo está implementando, con los préstamos que recibe compra los ingredientes necesarios para la preparación, pero también invierte en la compra D. utensilios como platos, cubiertos, su negocio está creciendo es por ello que Saturnina quiere ahorrar para ampliar su local y comprar sus muebles e implementar su negocio con otros platillos a base D. pescado.
texts.en:
The Santo Domingo community bank begins it’s 38th cycle with 13 members that belong to the Huancavelica department. Saturnina is one of the members, has a partner and six children, her oldest is 23 years old and her youngest is 12, they are all studying. Saturnina owns and works at a ceviche (seafood dish) shop that is located in the local market. She started this business with little capital but has slowly grown it with the loans that she gets she buys the necessary ingredients but also invests it in utensils such as plates and cutlery. Her business is growing and Saturnina wants to save to expand the shop and buy furniture as well as to incorporate other fish based dishes.

Translated from Spanish by Sofia Burt, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Marivel Beatriz

texts.es: La Señora Marivel se dedica  a elaborar masitas, tiene dos hornos en su casa  donde elabora variedad de masitas y pan casero y tambien elabora panes especiales para hamburguesa, vive en la zona de Villa Salome en casa propia,tiene 2 hijas que estan en el colegio, por las tardes la señora trabaja junto a su familia, el esposo y las dos hijas y por las mañanas la señora distribuye el producto por las zonas aledañas. El credito esta solicitando para comprar calaminas y vigas y asi ampliar el ambiente donde tarabajan la elboracion de los panes y las masitas. Es una cliente bastante trabajadora, responsable y alegre siempre pensando en el bienestar de su familia, esta muy agradecida con la institucion por la oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en:
Marivel bakes, she has two ovens in her house where she makes different baking and homemade bread, she also makes burger buns, she lives in the Villa Salome area in a house she owns. She has two daughters that are in school, in the afternoons she works with her family; her husband, her two daughters and in the mornings she distributes the product in different parts of town. The loan requested is to buy building material to expand the area where they work to make the baking. She is a hardworking person, responsible and always joyful and thinking about the well being of her family. She is very thankful to the institution for the opportunity given.

Translated from Spanish by Sofia Burt, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Expand Bakery

loans.name: Juan Israel

texts.es:
El señor Juan A. tiene su propia pulpería en el mercado Mayoreo en Managua donde atiende a diario desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana buscando la manera de suplir la demanda de sus clientes. 

Actualmente ha reconocido que necesita invertir por medio de productos para la pulpería y en especial algunos productos medicinales para también venderlos.

Espera que el crédito le sea otorgado y de esta manera continuar llevando a su casa el sustento e ir proyectándose como gran comerciante.
texts.en:
Juan A. has a general store in the wholesale market of Managua where he sells everyday since early in the morning to fulfill the demand from his clients. He has recently realized that he needs to invest through products for the store, particularly medicinal products to sell. He hopes that the loan will be granted to him so that this way he can continue to support his house and grow as a businessman.

Translated from Spanish by Sofia Burt, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy merchandise for general store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To improve her fish tanks and build a cement wall.

loans.name: Modesta Mercedes

texts.es:
En el Mercado Mayoreo en Managua, la señora Modesta Q. se ha dedicado a la venta de ropa y calzados pero actualmente se le ha agotado su mercadería por lo que requiere volver a invertir en la compra de la ropa y del calzado y para ello ha acudido a Ceprodel con el fin de realizar dicha compra y así vender sus productos a los clientes.

Espera ser beneficiada con el crédito ya que sus sueños son mejorar sus condiciones económicas debido a que es madre soltera pero con el gran deseo de superar y llevar el sustento a su hogar.
texts.en:
In the wholesale market of Managua Modesta Q. has been working in the sale of clothing and shoes, her merchandise has sold out recently and as a result she needs to invest in purchasing more product, she has approached Ceprodel with the purpose of making this purchase and keep selling products to her clients. She hopes to be granted the loan because her dream is to advance her economic conditions, she is a single mom but has great hopes to improve and support her home.

Translated from Spanish by Sofia Burt, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy clothing and shoes merchandise

loans.name: Eugenia

texts.es: Eugenia, de 50 años de edad, está casada y tiene seis hijos en su haber. Juntos viven en la comunidad de Villa Quintiarina, ubicada en la selva tropical peruana, donde tienen su propia casa a base de adobe. El negocio al que de dedica es la venta de cacao tanto en su comunidad como en otras localidades. Se siente muy contenta con su trabajo y por todas las cosas que ha logrado hasta el momento, incluso sus ventas aumentaron tempestivamente con respecto a los años anteriores. Usualmente trabaja conjuntamente con su esposo y juntos hacen un buen equipo de trabajo, pero en tiempo de vacaciones recibe la ayuda de sus hijos, sin embargo en temporada de cosecha tiene a cargo de sus peones para que le faciliten en la extracción y traslado de su producto final hacia los centros de acopio, y de esa forma pueda venderlos. Su plan futuro es abrir una tienda, con la finalidad de que pueda diversificar su cartera de clientes y a la vez mejorar su calidad de vida. Este es su séptimo  crédito con MFP, por el cual asegura cumplir fielmente con sus respectivos pagos, además está satisfecha con su banco comunal, ya que le trae muchos beneficios. Con el crédito que solicita lo piensa invertir en la educación de sus cuatro hijos y el resto será destinado para que acondicione su hogar.
texts.en:
Eugenia is 50 years old, married, and has six children. They live in the community of Villa Quintiarina, located in the Peruvian tropical jungle, in their own adobe home. Business-wise, she dedicates herself the selling of cacao, both in her own community as well as in other localities. She is very content with her work, and for everything that she has managed to achieve to date. In addition, her sales have increased when compared to previous years. She usually works alongside her husband and, together, they make a good team. During vacations, she gets help from her children. During harvest time, however, she has laborers that help her extract and transport her final product to the supply centers so it can be sold. Her plan for the future is to open a store, with the aim of diversifying her customer base to further improve her standard of living. This is her seventh credit with MFP, and she assures us she plans to faithfully comply with her payments. In addition, she is satisfied with her cooperative bank as it provides her with many benefits. She plans to use the loan to invest in the educations of four children, and the rest will be used to improve her home.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: For the educational expenses of her children.

loans.name: Silvio

texts.es:
El Señor Silvio C. de 32 años de edad trabaja como Vendedor Ambulante, el misma cuenta con un puesto de ventas al costado de la terminal de Villarrica.
Su cónyuge Crispina Almada de 27 años de edad es comerciante, se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras por la zona de Villarrica, ambos solicitaron dicho préstamo para la compra de mercaderías para el negocio (compra de frutas y verduras), ya que los mismos manifestaron que hay mucha venta y necesitan de capital para más mercaderías.
texts.en:
Silvio C. is 32 years old and works as a street vendor, with a stall next to the Villarrica terminal. His wife, Crispina Almada, is 27 years old and a merchant. He dedicates himself to selling fruits and vegetables in the Villarrica zone. They requested this loan in order to buy products for the business (fruits and vegetables). They both state that sales are brisk, and they need capital to buy more merchandise.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Herminio

texts.es:
El Señor  Herminio de 42 años de edad, acompañado, tiene 2 hijos menores de edad, cuenta con una despensa en su domicilio, conocido en la zona.
 Empezó hace más de 8 años con la ayuda de su Cónyuge Wilfrida Benítez Ocampos.
El negocio que poseen es gran medida el sustento del hogar ya que el señor Herminio también se dedica a otras actividades que le generan ingreso.

Solicito dicho préstamo a Fundación Paraguaya para la  compra de más mercaderías (arroz, fideo, azúcar, leche, etc.) para su almacén en mayor cantidad.
texts.en:
Herminio is 42 years old, married, and has 2 young children. He has a store in his home that is well known in the area. He started more than 8 years ago with the help of his spouse, Wilfrida Benítez Ocampos. This business, for the most part, sustains the household financially, although Herminio also dedicates himself to other activities that generate income. He has requested this loan from Fundación Paraguaya in order to purchase a greater quantity of more products (rice, noodles, sugar, milk, etc.) for his store.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase merchandise (rice, noodles, sugar, milk, etc.)

loans.name: Mujeres Anfitrionas Group

texts.es:
El comité Mujeres Anfitrionas se encuentra trabajando y desarrollando las capacitaciones con las asesoras quienes desarrollan las clases para las señoras aprovecen practicando lo aprendido en sus actividades.
Este comité es de San Lorenzo, en estos cuatro años de intenso trabajo han crecido tanto social como económicamente, son reconocidas en el lugar como mujeres muy trabajadoras. 
La señora Sebastina es una de las integrantes y ella se dedica a la atencion de un salón de belleza que posee en su casa.
Esta profesion lo aquirio desde muy joven y es una actividad que le gusta mucho, cuenta con clientela formada.
Comenta que esta muy satisfecha con sus compañeras del comité ya que se ayudan entre todas y al mismo tiempo ayudan tambien  a sus familias especialmente con los gastos de alimentación.
Ella solicita el préstamo para la compra de sillón para peluqueria y asi podrá brindar mejor atencion a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The committee of Mujeres Anfitrionas (Proprietor Women) is working and developing the skills with the facilitators that design classes for the ladies to practice what they’ve learned. This committee is from San Lorenzo, during the past four years of intense work they have grown not only socially but also financially, they are recognized in the area as very hardworking women. Sebastina is one of the members who works from home in a beauty salon. She started doing this activity at a very young age, she enjoys her work and has a good client base. She mentions being happy with the other members of her committee because they help each other while at the same time helping their families, particularly with food expense. She requests a loan to purchase a beauty shop chair to give better service to her clients.

Translated from Spanish by Sofia Burt, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy chair for beauty salon

loans.name: Eligio

texts.es:
El Sr. Eligio tiene 70 años de edad, está casado con la Sra. Wenceslaa Amarilla quienes forman una familia de tres varones y una mujer las cuales todos ya se encuentran casados, él se dedica a la compra y venta de ladrillos y también tiene una despensa en su domicilio, negocio el cual administra con su esposa.
Es una persona que ha trabajado toda la vida y gracias a su esfuerzo y constancia puede gozar de una vida tranquila y sin aprietos económicos junto a su familia.
Don Eligio solicita el crédito para la compra de ladrillos y mercaderías para su negocio.
texts.en:
Eligio is 70 years old and married to Wenceslaa Amarilla. They have raised a family of three sons and one daughter, all of whom are now married. Eligio works buying and selling bricks, and he also has a small general store in his home, a business which he manages together with his wife. He is a person who has worked all his life, and thanks to his effort and perseverance, he can now enjoy a peaceful life without economic stress together with his family. Eligio is requesting the loan to buy bricks as well as merchandise for his store.

Translated from Spanish by Patricia Linderman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying construction materials and merchandise to sell, such as canned and packaged foods, dairy products, cleaning supplies, etc.

loans.name: Heydi Jose

texts.es: La joven de Heydi tiene 30 años.  Es madre soltera y tiene 1 hijo a su cargo con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha salido adelante.  Pues sus inicios  fueron muy difíciles, pues desde joven empezó a trabajar, por lo que necesitaba mantener a su familia. Con esfuerzo y algunos ahorros decidió independizarse y trabajar. Poco a poco obtuvo clientela ahora ella tiene su negocio y trabaja desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche la venta de mercadería en general ha sido muy importante. Este financiamiento es para la compra de aretes, pintura de labios, pintura de uñas, perfumes, cremas, tratamientos y bolsos.
texts.en:
Heidy is 30, she is a single mom, has one son that she has been able to get ahead with great effort and dedication. It was hard from her from the beginning because she had to start working at a very young age to support her family. With hard work and after saving for a while she decided to become an independent worker. She gained clients slowly and now has her own business, she works from 6 am to 7 pm selling general merchandise. This loan is to buy merchandise such as earrings, lipstick, nail polish, perfumes, lotions, skin treatments and handbags.

Translated from Spanish by Sofia Burt, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy merchandise

loans.name: Santa Fe Group

texts.es:
el grupo denominado Santa FE con cede en la aldea Las Balitas se constituyo con el proposito de solicitar un credito para capital de trabajo, son 3 hombres que se conocen desde muchos años. a continuacion se detallan las diferentes actividades que ellos realizan:

el señor Celestino R. tiene 60 años de edad, esta casado y dependen de el una hija a la cual la tiene estudiando.
Celestino se dedica a la ganaderia y a la venta de leña seca para el consumo domestico, vende maiz por quintal. el credito lo utilizara para comprar 25 carretadas de leña para almacenar y luego estar vendiendo todo los dias, Celestino transporta la leña en su carro.

el sr. Lorenzo R. tiene 40 años de edad, esta casado y tiene 4 hijos que dependen de el,  su esposa le ayuda en los trabajos de la casa y Lorenzo se dedica a la compra y venta de leña seca y al cultivo de maiz y sandia.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de maiz y leña seca.
Lorenzo se dedica a este rubro desde hace 15 años.
 
el sr. Jose Antonio C. R. tiene 39 años de edad, vive en union libre con la señora Martha Luz Villalobos con quien tiene 3 hijos. 
el señor C. se dedica  a la venta de leña en su carreta de bueyes, esta actividad es la que le da el sustento para su familia. el credito lo utilizara para compra de leña seca y venderla a la ciudad de Nacaome el costo de venta de una carretada de leña es de Lps.500.00.
texts.en:
The group known as “Santa Fe,” headquartered in the village of Las Balitas, was constituted with the purpose of requesting a loan to be used as working capital. It is composed of three men who have known each other for many years. Following are details on each one’s activities: Mr. Celestino R., 60, is married and has a dependent daughter who is a student. Celestino is a cattleman and sells dry firewood for domestic use. He also sells corn by the quintal (a weight measure equivalent to 46 kilos). He will use the funds to buy 25 cartloads of firewood to store for subsequent daily sales. Celestino transports the firewood in his car. Mr. Lorenzo R., 40, is married and has 4 dependent children. His wife helps with the household chores and Lorenzo is a dry firewood merchant; he also farms corn and watermelon. He will use the funds to buy corn and dry firewood. Lorenzo has been in this line of work for 15 years. Mr. José Antonio Cárdenas R., 39, lives in a common-law union with Mrs. Martha Luz Villalobos with whom he has 3 children. Mr. Cárdenas uses his ox cart to sell firewood. It is with this activity that he supports his family. He will use the funds to buy dry firewood to sell in the city of Nacaome. A cartload of firewood sells for Lps. 500.00.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: For corn and firewood.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Milenka

texts.es: La Señorita Milenka vive en casa de sus padres donde tiene su pequeña pensión que atiende mayormente por las noches ella comenzó desde pequeña a trabajar con su mama y aprendio mucho su especialidad es el  Silpancho plato típico de la región. Saco el crédito para mejorar su negocio comprara un televisor, dvd, y manteles ahora ella es un cliente mas de emprender y kiva. Ya que se le dio esta oportunidad para que crezca mas y mejore sus ingresos y por ende su economía, la Señorita tiene muchos deseos uno de ellos es poder tener un restaurante grande y reconocido por los clientes.
texts.en:
Milenka lives in her parents’ house where she has a small eatery that she opens mostly in the evening. She started working since a very young age helping her mother and she learned much. Her specialty is Silpancho, a dish that is typical of the area (consists of a base layer of rice, followed by a layer of boiled and sliced potatoes, followed by a thin schnitzel-style meat, followed by another layer of chopped tomato, onion and parsley mixed together and topped with either one or two fried eggs.) She took out the loan to improve her eatery; she will buy a television set, DVD player and tablecloths. She is now one more client of Emprender and Kiva. Having gotten the opportunity to grow more and improve her income, the young lady has many wishes among which is to have a large restaurant that is well-known by customers.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a television set, DVD player, tablecloths and others.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana tiene 49 años,  vive con sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. Hace más de 10 años cría vacas y toros, en el que diariamente extrae la leche necesaria para venderlos a sus vecino o a empresas que se dediquen a la producción de queso; por otro lado procura alimentar bien a sus toros y por el lapso de 3 meses los vende a un precio más alto que la inicial o son utilizados para el arado en el campo. En ocasiones recibe la ayuda de sus hijos, encargándose de cortar el pasto y alimentar a sus reses o en la venda de leche. Lo que le agrada de su trabajo es que puede disponer de su tiempo para atender a su familia, además de ser un trabajo independiente y rentable, razón por el cual  tiene deseos de incrementar la cantidad de reses que tiene para aumentar la producción de leche. Es su quinto crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado ser responsable en sus pagos, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de alimento balanceado para sus animales y un pequeño becerro.
texts.en:
